products.title: Splash Chilli Red Panel Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash chilli red panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The medium red panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.

products.title: Splash Ruby Red Panel Blind
products.description: Splash ruby red panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window. The saturated red, moisture-resistant fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.title: Splash Grey Panel Blind
products.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their splash fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This grey panel blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This panel blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

products.title: Voile Fr Moondust Grey Panel Blind
products.description: Their flame retardant voile range of fabrics are both beautiful & contemporary. This dark grey panel blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice. Their voile moondust grey panel is also allergy resistant which means it is the best choice for bedrooms and kitchens. At swift direct blinds, their modern, panelblinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with their high quality products, that this panel blind is covered with their free 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in their blinds.

products.title: Eco Friendly Fr Grey Panel Blind
products.description: Their eco-friendly, recycled panel blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new grey panel blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.
